updates.text: 7.08pm: SPLRT - Please note that the Sengkang-Punggol LRT will be running only on one track for the evening peak period. Please expect a frequency of about five minutes for the train services. Free regular and bridging bus services are still available between all Sengkang-Punggol LRT stations.

The escalator at Serangoon train station leading to the North East Line (NEL) platform is currently out of service. As a result, queues for the train towards Punggol Coast are becoming extensive, reaching the opposite platform, prompting a suggestion for commuters to consider alternate travel plans.

6.38pm: SPLRT - Please note that the Sengkang-Punggol LRT will be running only on one track for the evening peak period. Please expect a frequency of about five minutes for the train services. Free regular and bridging bus services are still available between all Sengkang-Punggol LRT stations.

6.08pm: SPLRT - Please note that the Sengkang-Punggol LRT will be running only on one track for the evening peak period. Please expect a frequency of about five minutes for the train services. Free regular and bridging bus services are still available between all Sengkang-Punggol LRT stations.

6.00pm: SPLRT - Please note that the Sengkang-Punggol LRT will be running only on one track for the evening peak period till about 9pm. Please expect a frequency of about five minutes for the train services. Free regular and bridging bus services are still available between all Sengkang-Punggol LRT stations.

5.30pm: SPLRT - Please note that the Sengkang-Punggol LRT will be running only on one track for the evening peak period till about 9pm. Please expect a frequency of about five minutes for the train services. Free regular and bridging bus services are still available between all Sengkang-Punggol LRT stations.

4.33pm: SPLRT - Sengkang LRT is operating as usual while Punggol LRT is progressively resuming service with only one track on both East and West loops in operations. Please expect a frequency of about five minutes for the single car trains that are deployed. Free regular and bridging bus services are available between all Sengkang-Punggol LRT stations.

4.24am: SPLRT - Sengkang LRT is operating as usual while Punggol LRT is progressively resuming service with only one track on both East and West loops in operations. Please expect a frequency of about five minutes for the single car trains that are deployed. Free regular and bridging bus services are available between all Sengkang-Punggol LRT stations.

4.00pm: SPLRT - Sengkang LRT service has resumed. Due to a power fault, there is still no service in Punggol LRT. Free regular and bridging bus services are available between all Sengkang-Punggol LRT stations.
3.30pm: SPLRT - Due to a power fault, there is no service in Sengkang-Punggol LRT. Free regular and bridging bus services are available between all Sengkang-Punggol LRT stations.
2.30pm: NEL - NEL full service has resumed. Free regular and bridging bus services are still available at the designated bus stops.
2.30pm: SPLRT - Due to a power fault, there is no service in Sengkang-Punggol LRT. Free regular and bridging bus services are available between all Sengkang-Punggol LRT stations.
2.18pm: NEL - NEL full service has resumed. Free regular and bridging bus services are still available at the designated bus stops.

2.00pm: NEL - Due to a power fault, there is no service between Buangkok and Punggol Coast Station. Free regular and bridging bus services are available between Dhoby Ghaut and Punggol Coast stations.
2.00pm: SPLRT - Due to a power fault, there is no service in Sengkang-Punggol LRT. Free regular and bridging bus services are available between all Sengkang-Punggol LRT stations.

1.38pm: NEL - Due to a power fault, there is no service between Buangkok and Punggol Coast Station. Free regular and bridging bus services are available between Dhoby Ghaut and Punggol Coast stations.
1.05pm: NEL - Due to a power fault, there is no service between Bungkok and Punggol Coast Station. Free regular and bridging bus services are available between Dhoby Gaut and Punggol Coast stations.
1.00pm: SPLRT - Due to a power fault, there is no service in Sengkang-Punggol LRT. Free regular and bridging bus services are available between all Sengkang-Punggol LRT stations.

1.00pm: NEL - Due to a power fault, there is no service between Farrer Park and Punggol Coast Station. Free regular and bridging bus services are available between Dhoby Gaut and Punggol Coast stations.
Service between Farrer Park and Punggol Coast, a stretch of 11 stations, is affected. Sengkang-Punggol LRT services are also unavailable.

12.30pm: NEL - Due to a power fault, there is no service between Farrer Park and Punggol Coast Station. Free regular and bridging bus services are available between Dhoby Gaut and Punggol Coast stations.
12.30pm: SPLRT - Due to a power fault, there is no service in Sengkang-Punggol LRT. Free regular and bridging bus services are available between all Sengkang Punggol LRT stations.
Train services were disrupted along the North East Line, affected 11 stations between Farrer Park and Punggol Coast MRT stations.

11.42am: NEL - Due to a power fault, there is no service between Farrer Park and Punggol Coast Station. Free regular and bridging bus services are available between Dhoby Gaut and Punggol Coast stations. Sengkang Punggol LRT service is also not available.
11.43am: SPLRT - Due to a power fault, there is no service in Sengkang-Punggol LRT. Free regular and bridging bus services are available between all Sengkang Punggol LRT stations.

11.42am: NEL - Due to a power fault, there is no service between Farrer Park and Punggol Coast Station. Free regular and bridging bus services are available between Dhoby Gaut and Punggol Coast stations. Sengkang Punggol LRT service is also not available.

11.27am: NEL- Due to a power fault, there is no service between Farrer Park and Punggol Coast Station. Free regular and bridging bus services from Dhoby Gaut to Punggol Coast stations. Sengkang Punggol LRT service is also not available.
